Author: crankyhedgiebutt
Text: It sounds to me he doesn’t know what to feed you and that he wants you to be comfortable at home.   I think his comments about it’s okay to eat and it’s okay to eat healthy is his way of saying that there’s a balance and you shouldn’t worry so much. Sounds to me like he realizes somethings up.  Like the other commenter said, I think your ED brain latched onto the wrong parts of his comments and spun them another way. That’s what our dumb ED brains to do us!! they want to control us

Author: ridingthecurve
Text: it sucks but it doesn't sound like he's coming from a bad place tbh. at least for myself i know that i get super uncomfortable when people starts giving me unwarranted help and advice or comments on my eating habits. it's even harder when they don't intend to be malicious bc then i can't really get mad at them lol. i have to remind myself they don't mean any harm and it's just the ED brain talking
